list.name: H-SwarmLoc
list.content: A collaborative localization system for the low-cost heterogeneous MAV swarm. This system takes full advantage of advanced MAV to effectively achieve accurate localization of the heterogeneous MAV swarm through collaboration. Subsequently, H-SwarmLoc, a reinforcement learning-based planning method is proposed to plan the advanced MAV with a non-myopic objective in real-time. The experimental results show that the localization performance of our method improves 40% on average compared with baselines.
list.title: Efficient Scheduling for Localization of Heterogeneous MAV Swarm
